translations: 食尸鬼似的；令人毛骨悚然的

sentences.sentence: They are there only to satisfy their ghoulish curiosity.
sentences.translation: 他们在那里只是为了满足其残忍的好奇心。

sentences.sentence: This idea may stem from ghoulish novels.
sentences.translation: 这个认识可能来自恐怖小说。

sentences.sentence: His ghoulish moves in the video have been imitated by dancers all over the world。
sentences.translation: 他在录像带中表演的魔鬼舞被全世界的舞者所效仿。
